title: Struggling a little bit on how to cope with anxiety during these pandemic times?
summary: You're not alone. At all. We're all going through it whether you're conciously aware of it or not. It's important to try to work towards figuring out how to handle negative thoughts, how to practise gratitude, and how to both accept the situation, and find out what you can actively do to improve the situation.
source: Here's a great podcast episode from Elizabeth from 'How To Fail' that touches upon this topic. Give it a listen and let us know what you learn! ðŸ‘‚
